title: Michel Maurer
text: Michael Maurer (12 October 1904 – 23 November 1983) was a Luxembourgian <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1924%20Summer%20Olympics">1924 Summer Olympics</a>. In 1924 he was eliminated in the second round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201924%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20light%20heavyweight">light heavyweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="John%20Courtis">John Courtis</a> of <a href="Great%20Britain">Great Britain</a>.
